top_comments.comment: Caitlyn really needed a redesign. Her original one was iconic for the time, but it looks a bit goofy now in the modern game.
I mean she just got sexier a bit more, making it harder for us men.( also WHERE IS JAX VISUAL REWORK GUYS WTF)
Fantastic start to the ASU era, well done Riot, we can't wait to see more!

leave caitlyn as she currently is, it's ugly, caitlyn doesn't need any rework, don't spoil her please

deixa a caitlyn como ela é atualmente, ta tudo feio, a caitlyn não precisa de nenhum rework, não estraguem ela por favor

comments_since_last_sample.body: So she got a bigger gun? I'm sorry I don't know what changed to her appearance at all apart from the gun
I love that one consistent part of the Arctic Warfare splash arts was "SHE HAS A PUBBY"
caitlyn my wife I love her, thanks riot for this
I love this, please keep making another theme for old champions

Really Good, this change make me want to play ADC before a Zed came in an one-shot me.
Also I think Caitlyn need a Voice update, she needs to be more energetic.
